title: Norton 360 Version 2  - 11 years license (verified working!)
description:
Norton 360 version 2 Upgrade:

The install files have been checked with Norton Version 1 with latest Symantec definitions and no malware was found !

Read included instructions carefully :

1. Install Norton 360 V1 first (NOT included in the download!!)

2. Crack it using any of the keygens and get it working for 11 years.

3. Use Norton Removal Tool (included) to remove V1 completely.

4. Run Norton 360 V2 setup (included). Do NOT stay connected to the net or try to \\\"Activate\\\".

5. Backup CLTVault.dll from c:\\\\program files\\\\norton 360\\\\ in another safe location.

6. Restart windows in safe mode (use F8 at boot time for Vista) and copy the CLTVault.dll included in the torrent to c:\\\\program files\\\\norton 360\\\\

7. Restart your system. 

8. Make sure you are disconnected from the net. Goto Norton 360 V2 window and click on \\\"Activate\\\". After 1-2 failed attempts of connecting to the net, it\\\&#039;ll accept your previous subscription status and show norton activated for 4015 days.

9. Use LiveUpdate to update definitions...



Cheers..
